            || (document && document.documentElement && document.documentElement.clientWidth)

            // wait two seconds to make sure this performance metric has been recorded
            setTimeout(function () {
                if (performance && performance.timing) {
                    var domContentLoadedTime = ((performance.timing.domContentLoadedEventStart - performance.timing.navigationStart)/1000).toFixed(2);
                    ua('set', 'dimension72', domContentLoadedTime);
                    ga('set', 'dimension72', domContentLoadedTime);
                }
            }, 2000);
            document.removeEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', ProfileDOMContentLoadedEvent);
        });

        window.addEventListener('load', function ProfileLoadEvent (e) {
            // wait two seconds to make sure this performance metric has been recorded
            setTimeout(function () {
                if (performance && performance.timing) {
                    var loadEventTime = ((performance.timing.loadEventEnd - performance.timing.navigationStart)/1000).toFixed(2);
                    ua('set', 'dimension73', loadEventTime);
                    ga('set', 'dimension73', loadEventTime);
                }
            }, 2000);
            window.removeEventListener('load', ProfileLoadEvent);
        });

    </script><link id="mapPrefetch" rel="preload" as="image" href=""/><script type="application/javascript">
            window.mapPlaceholders = {"3":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=3&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=P87ST34X-ccsvFwQo2KLYoK55Pk=","4":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=4&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=ka3InlVCnrfkWUsQMa6HOHPDMOk=","5":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=5&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=fL1MZoAcHfqYzp6hhRnqx6-wQIs=","6":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=6&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=mO_yLHxoxs750RYWV2xR5jbHYKQ=","7":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=7&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=-Jt7s0mF2A3CLdSp6VQYCQRTDvo=","8":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=8&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=pposlFhODEKL2l7z7hEMnq7L7ro=","9":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=9&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=_rPjtQ4OHJOGr9gpely5WmjSHq8=","10":"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=41.076017,-73.481401&zoom=10&size=905x720&maptype=roadmap&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3 atellite&key=AIzaSyA1uIgJLlFocMlwcu8b3wKPKkdT2mWV3AU&style=feature%3Aall%7Celement%3Alabels%7Cvisibility%3Aoff&signature=SpSqsI2iz3hHzgJjBqlCFlocy9Q="};

            // Polyfill for IE11
            Math.tanh = Math.tanh || function(x){
                var a = Math.exp(+x), b = Math.exp(-x);
                return a == Infinity ? 1 : (b == Infinity ? -1 : (a - b) / (a + b));
            }

            function degreesToRadians(deg) {
              return deg * (Math.PI / 180);
            }

            function radiansToDegrees(rad) {
              return rad / (Math.PI / 180);
            }

            function getBoundsAndZoomLevel(northLat, southLat, westLng, eastLng, spaceHeight, spaceWidth) {
                var WORLD_DIM = { height: 256, width: 256 };
                var ZOOM_MAX = 19;

                function latRad(lat) {
                    var sin = Math.sin(degreesToRadians(lat));
                    var radX2 = Math.log((1 + sin) / (1 - sin)) / 2;
                    return Math.max(Math.min(radX2, Math.PI), -Math.PI) / 2;
                }

                function fracToZoom(mapPx, worldPx, fraction) {
                    var v = Math.log(mapPx / worldPx / fraction) / Math.LN2;
                    // Adjust for floating error on exact fit
                    return Math.floor(v + 0.00001);
                }

                function zoomToFrac(mapPx, worldPx, zoom) {
                    return (mapPx / worldPx) / Math.exp(zoom * Math.LN2);
                }

                // ====================================================================
                // Calculate the zoom level to fit these bounds into the given viewport
                // ====================================================================

                // Sphere math to turn lat and long into degrees out of 360
                var latRadNorth = latRad(northLat);
                var latRadSouth = latRad(southLat);
                var latRadDiff = latRadNorth - latRadSouth;
                var latFraction = latRadDiff / Math.PI;

                var lngDiff = eastLng - westLng;
                var lngFraction = ((!(lngDiff >= 0)) ? (lngDiff + 360) : lngDiff) / 360;

                var latZoom = fracToZoom(spaceHeight, WORLD_DIM.height, latFraction);
                var lngZoom = fracToZoom(spaceWidth, WORLD_DIM.width, lngFraction);

                var finalZoom = Math.min(latZoom, lngZoom, ZOOM_MAX);

                // ========================================================
                // Calculate the viewport-exact bounds for this zoom level
                // ========================================================

                var fittedLngFraction = zoomToFrac(spaceWidth, WORLD_DIM.width, finalZoom);
                var lngDegreeCenter = (eastLng + westLng) / 2;
                var fittedLngDiff = lngDiff * (fittedLngFraction / lngFraction)
                var fittedWestLng = lngDegreeCenter - (fittedLngDiff / 2);
                var fittedEastLng = lngDegreeCenter + (fittedLngDiff / 2);

                var fittedLatRadFraction = zoomToFrac(spaceHeight, WORLD_DIM.height, finalZoom);
                var latRadCenter = (latRadNorth + latRadSouth) / 2;
                var fittedLatRadDiff = latRadDiff * (fittedLatRadFraction / latFraction);
                var fittedNorthLat = radiansToDegrees(Math.asin(Math.tanh(2 * (latRadCenter + (fittedLatRadDiff/2)))));
                var fittedSouthLat = radiansToDegrees(Math.asin(Math.tanh(2 * (latRadCenter - (fittedLatRadDiff/2)))));

                return {
                    zoom: finalZoom,
                    bounds: {
                        northLat: fittedNorthLat,
                        southLat: fittedSouthLat,
                        eastLng: fittedEastLng,
                        westLng: fittedWestLng,
                    }
                }
            }

            /*
                This must be kept synchronized with these vars in https://gitlab.zgtools.net/zillow/searchxp/static-search-page/-/blob/master/src/search-app/less/constants.less
                    @wideSingleColumnMinWidth
                    @wideDoubleColumnMinWidth
                    @searchListSingleColumnWidth_DoubleColTest
                    @searchListDoubleColumnWidth_DoubleColTest
            */
            function getListCardColumnWidth() {
                if (window.innerWidth >= 1280) {
                    return 750;
                } else if (window.innerWidth >= 1007) {
                    return 375;
                } else {
                    return 0;
                }
            }

            var northLat = 41.115722;
            var southLat = 41.036312;
            var westLng = -73.517931;
            var eastLng = -73.444871;

            var Z_HEADER_HEIGHT = 80;
            var SRP_HEADER_HEIGHT = 55;

            // Only prefetch when the window is wide enough to display a map and list view
            if (window.innerWidth >= 1007){
                var boundsAndZoom = getBoundsAndZoomLevel(northLat, southLat, westLng, eastLng, window.innerHeight - SRP_HEADER_HEIGHT - Z_HEADER_HEIGHT, window.innerWidth - getListCardColumnWidth());
                window.boundsAndZoom = boundsAndZoom;
                // Use a placeholder image one zoom level out, since we are stretching the image out 2x, which has the effect of zooming in.
                window.selectedPrefetch = window.mapPlaceholders[boundsAndZoom.zoom-1];

                // Kick off a prefetch since the image won't be actually consumed till SSP initial render
                document.querySelector("#mapPrefetch").href = window.selectedPrefetch;
            }
        </script><script>window.cpErrors=0;window._onSentryLoad=function(){Sentry.onLoad(function(){Sentry.init({sampleRate:0.02,environment:"production",beforeSend:function(a){window.cpErrors++;return a}})})};lifecycleQueue.addCallbackToEvent(function(){Sentry.forceLoad()},"priorityUIReady");</script><script crossorigin="anonymous" defer="true" src="https://js.sentry-cdn.com/11f110c8142f4b9f8bf48c0775de8d17.min.js" onload="window._onSentryLoad()"></script><script type="text/javascript">window.addEventListener("load",function(){var a=document.getElementsByTagName("head");if(a&&a.length>0){a[0].insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend","")}},false);</script><meta name="ROBOTS" content="NOINDEX"/><meta name="y_key" content="7cb4abe457d82ae8"/><link rel="canonical" href="https://www.zillow.com/darien-ct-06820/"></link><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, height=device-height, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no"></meta><meta itemprop="name" content="Zillow Real Estate, Rentals, and Mortgage"/><meta itemprop="description" content="The most trafficked website about home sales and rentals, with real estate values for almost every U.S. home. 1,000,000 listings that you won't find on MLS."/><meta itemprop="image" content="https://www.zillowstatic.com/static/images/social/share_thumbnail.png"></meta><link rel="start" title="Zillow home" href="/"/><!--[if gte IE 9]><link rel="shortcut icon" href="/static/images/ie9_favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon"/><![endif]--><meta property="og:title" content="06820 Real Estate - 06820 Homes For Sale | Zillow"/><meta property="og:url" content="https://www.zillow.com/homes/for_sale/06820/0_singlestory/days_sort/"/><meta property="og:image" content="/apple-touch-icon.png"/><meta property="og:description" content="Zillow has 52 homes for sale in 06820. /*
object-assign
(c) Sindre Sorhus
@license MIT
*/var r=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols,o=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,i=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;function a(e){if(null==e)throw new TypeError("Object.assign cannot be called with null or undefined");return Object(e)}e.exports=function(){try{if(!Object.assign)return!1;var e=new String("abc");if(e[5]="de","5"===Object.getOwnPropertyNames(e)[0])return!1;for(var t={},n=0;n<10;n++)t["_"+String.fromCharCode(n)]=n;if("0123456789"!==Object.getOwnPropertyNames(t).map((function(e){return t[e]})).join(""))return!1;var r={};return"abcdefghijklmnopqrst".split("").forEach((function(e){r[e]=e})),"abcdefghijklmnopqrst"===Object.keys(Object.assign({},r)).join("")}catch(e){return!1}}()?Object.assign:function(e,t){for(var n,u,c=a(e),s=1;s<arguments.length;s++){for(var l in n=Object(arguments[s]))o.call(n,l)&&(c[l]=n[l]);if(r){u=r(n);for(var f=0;f<u.length;f++)i.call(n,u[f])&&(c[u[f]]=n[u[f]])}}return c}},function(e,t,n){"use strict";Object.defineProperty(t,"__esModule",{value:!0});var r=n(2),o=n.n(r),i=n(3),a=n.n(i),u=n(4),c=n.n(u)()("static-client-profiler","client-profiler")||{};Object.keys(c).length<1&&console.warn("No config provided to client profiler!   display: block;
}
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + label:before,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + div > label:before,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + label:after,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + div > label:after {
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + label:after,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-popover input[type=checkbox] + div > label:after {
  color: #FFF;
  background-color: #006AFF;
  font-size: 10px;
  line-height: 14px;
}
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .more-filters .filter-checkbox-list input[type=checkbox] + label::before,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .more-filters .filter-checkbox-list input[type=checkbox] + div > label::before,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .more-filters .filter-checkbox-list input[type=checkbox] + label::after,
.exposed-filters .filter-buttons .more-filters .filter-checkbox-list input[type=checkbox] + div > label::after {
  top: 3px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters {
  background: none;
  padding: 0 12px;
  flex-grow: 0;
  /**** Filter popover width and positioning ****
                By default a popover will expand to match the size of the nearest ancestor with
                non-default positioning, which for these is the entire bar of filter buttons.
                In order to match the specs, we explicitly set the width of each popover.
                In order to keep the popover near the button but not flowing off the side of the screen
                we use the inherited value of 0 for right or left and set the other to auto to align the
                popover with the right or left edge of the filter buttons bar (which will always be
                fully on screen).
            */
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container {
  margin-right: 12px;
  /* end filter popover width and positioning */
  flex: none;
  width: 120px;
  overflow: visible;
  position: relative;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container:last-child {
  margin-right: 0;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container .filter-button-popover {
  left: auto;
  right: auto;
  top: 35px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.listing-type .filter-button-popover,
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.price .filter-button-popover,
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.beds .filter-button-popover {
  left: 0;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.home-type .filter-button-popover,
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.more .filter-button-popover,
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.MoveInDate .filter-button-popover {
  right: 0;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.more {
  width: 70px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.listing-type .filter-button-popover {
  width: 410px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.price .filter-button-popover {
  width: 375px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.beds .filter-button-popover {
  width: 410px;
}
.search-page-header.wide .exposed-filters .filter-buttons .filter-button-container.home-type .filter-button-popover {
  width: 276px;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
  .yui3-lightbox-content.lightbox_responsive {
    margin: 0;
    padding-top: 30px;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    max-width: none !important;
    min-height: 100%;
    top: 0;
  }
  .lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.lightbox_responsive {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
}
.yui3-lightbox-mask.lightbox-transition-enter {
  animation-name: fadeMask;
}
.yui3-lightbox-mask.lightbox-transition-leave {
  animation-name: fadeMask;
  animation-direction: reverse;
  opacity: 0;
}
.lightbox-transition-enter .yui3-lightbox-content.fade,
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.fade {
  animation-name: fade;
}
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.fade {
  opacity: 0;
}
.lightbox-transition-enter .yui3-lightbox-content.slideUp,
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.slideUp {
  animation-name: slideUp;
}
.lightbox-transition-enter .yui3-lightbox-content.slideLeft,
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.slideLeft {
  animation-name: slideLeft;
}
.lightbox-transition-enter .yui3-lightbox-content.fadeAndSlideUp,
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.fadeAndSlideUp {
  animation-name: fadeAndSlideUp;
}
.lightbox-transition-enter .yui3-lightbox-content.fadeAndSlideLeft,
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content.fadeAndSlideLeft {
  animation-name: fadeAndSlideLeft;
}
.lightbox-transition-leave .yui3-lightbox-content {
  animation-direction: reverse;
  margin-top: 10px;
}
@keyframes fadeMask {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0.9;
  }
}
@keyframes fade {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes slideUp {
  0% {
    transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }
}
@keyframes slideLeft {
  0% {
    transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }
}
@keyframes fadeAndSlideUp {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }
}
@keyframes fadeAndSlideLeft {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }
}

    -webkit-transform: translateZ(1px);

/**
 *  Mobile toast message
 *
 *  @refby
 *      hdp-mobile-web.less
**/
@-webkit-keyframes fade-in-fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  30% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@-moz-keyframes fade-in-fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  30% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@-ms-keyframes fade-in-fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  30% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@-o-keyframes fade-in-fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  30% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@keyframes fade-in-fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  30% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

  opacity: 0;
  z-index: 20010;
  position: fixed;
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  background: rgba(99, 227, 125, 0.9);
  color: #FFF;
  text-align: center;
  margin-left: -60px;
  margin-top: -60px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  -moz-animation-duration: 2.5s;
  -webkit-animation-duration: 2.5s;
  -ms-animation-duration: fade-in-fade-out;
  -moz-animation-name: fade-in-fade-out;
  -webkit-animation-name: fade-in-fade-out;
  -ms-animation-name: fade-in-fade-out;
}

  margin-bottom: 0px;
}

    padding: 20px;
  }
  .responsive-search-page .short-list-cards .result-list-container .search-title {
    margin-bottom: 8px;
  }
}

}
/*
    Zoom, Map Type, Draw Search Rotation control styles for the map
*/
/* Gradients */
/* Opacity */
/* Transitions */
.responsive-search-page .map-control-disabled {
  cursor: default;
  zoom: 1;
  filter: alpha(opacity=33);
  opacity: 33 / 100;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.8s;
  -moz-transition: opacity 0.8s;
  -ms-transition: opacity 0.8s;
  -o-transition: opacity 0.8s;
  transition: opacity 0.8s;
  z-index: 0;
  color: #2A2A33;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #FFF, #FFF);
  background: linear-gradient(to top, #FFF, #FFF);
  background-repeat: repeat-x;
}
.responsive-search-page .map-controls-wrapper {
  /* We need to position elements at the top and bottom of the page so the container covers the whole map.
            We don't want to absorb pointer events intended for the map but we do want to recognize clicks on
            the controls themselves.
        */
  pointer-events: none;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  flex-grow: 1;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.responsive-search-page .map-controls-wrapper:not(.disabled) > * {
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.responsive-search-page .map-controls-wrapper.touch {
  padding: 8px;
}

  padding: 8px 13px;

/*
    Set the default grey background of the Google map to transparent to allow the placeholder map to show through.
    There doesn't seem to be a better way to specify the correct div unfortunately.
*/

  background-color: #FFF0 !important;
}
/*
    Namespace static-search-page's imported map styling so that it doesn't collide with other bundles
    bringing other versions of zillow-map-control styling onto the page (e.g. HDP, CDP)
*/
.search-page-map-container {
  overflow: hidden;
}
.search-page-map-container .zillow-map-control {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

  stroke: white;
}

  stroke: rgba(56, 124, 237, 0.8);
  stroke-width: 3px;
}

  stroke-width: 1px;
  stroke: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

  fill: rgba(116, 183, 74, 0.5);
}

  stroke-width: 2px;
}

  fill: rgba(56, 124, 237, 0.2);
}

  fill: transparent;
  color: transparent;
}

  stroke: black;
}

.search-page-map-overlay {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 24px;
  position: relative;
  /* We need to position elements at the corners of the page so the container covers the whole map.
        We don't want to absorb pointer events intended for the map but we do want to recognize clicks on
        the controls themselves.
    */
  pointer-events: none;
}
.search-page-map-overlay > * > * {
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.mobile-search-page-map-overlay {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 24px;
  position: relative;
  /* We need to position elements at the corners of the page so the container covers the whole map.
        We don't want to absorb pointer events intended for the map but we do want to recognize clicks on
        the controls themselves.
    */
  pointer-events: none;
}
.mobile-search-page-map-overlay > * > * {
  pointer-events: auto;
}

  .mobile-search-page-map-overlay {
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    padding: 0;
  }
}

  max-width: 320px;
}
.search-page-controls-overlay {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;
  flex: 1 0 auto;
}
/* In draw mode the draw controls take up the top bit of the map.
   In order to avoid overlap or shifting the bottom of our custom
   overlay off the bottom of the page we use growable flex elements
   to fill up the remaining space.
*/
#search-page-map .zillow-map-draw-overlay {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
#search-page-map .zillow-map-draw-overlay .zillow-map-draw-custom-overlay {
  flex-grow: 1;
  display: flex;
  pointer-events: none;
}

  position: relative;
  flex-grow: 1;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;
}

}

  color: #006AFF;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 10px 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.exposed-filters .filter-wrapper {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 50%);
  grid-template-rows: repeat(4, minmax(60px, auto));
}

  grid-column-start: 1;
  grid-column-end: 3;
}
.ie .exposed-filters .filter-wrapper {
  -ms-grid-columns: 50% 50%;
}

  -ms-grid-column-span: 2;
  grid-row: 3;
}

  grid-row: 4;
  grid-column: 1;
}

  grid-row: 4;
  grid-column: 2;

  grid-column: 1;

Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

                            (function() {
                                if (!window.__NEXT_DATA__ || window.shopperPlatformInResponsiveLightbox) {
                                    var nextjsContainer = document.querySelector('#__next');
                                    var devScripts = document.querySelectorAll("#__NEXT_SCRIPTS_DEV__ script[src]");
                                    var scripts = document.querySelectorAll("#__NEXT_SCRIPTS__ script[src]");
                                    var appendScript = function(src, container, onload) {
                                        var s = document.createElement("script");
                                        s.src = src;
                                        if (onload) {
                                            s.onload = onload;
                                        }
                                        container.appendChild(s);
                                    };

                                    var injectMainNextScripts = function() {
                                        for (var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++) {
                                            if (!scripts[i].src.indexOf('.map') > -1) {
                                                appendScript(scripts[i].src, nextjsContainer);
                                            }
                                        }
                                    };

                                    if(!devScripts.length) {
                                        injectMainNextScripts();
                                    } else {
                                        for (var i = 0; i < devScripts.length; i++) {
                                            var onload = devScripts.length === (i + 1) ? injectMainNextScripts : undefined;
                                            appendScript(devScripts[i].src, nextjsContainer, onload);
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            })();
